article_title: Is CVS-Omnicare Deal a By-Product of Obamacare?
article_text: Connecting decision makers to a dynamic network of information, people and ideas, Bloomberg quickly and accurately delivers business and financial information, news and insight around the world.

article_metadata.description: CVS Health is acquiring Omnicare in a deal with $12.7 billion that will offer CVS an entry into the nursing-home pharmacy sector. Bloomberg’s Cynthia Koons reports on “Bloomberg Markets.” (Source: Bloomberg)
